diff_hunk:
@@ -2939,8 +2939,9 @@
         kwarg_only: True
       - THTensor* mat1
       - THTensor* mat2
-    - cname: spaddmm
-      sparse: yes
+    - sparse: True
body:
For a given option, `aten_sparse` says that the cname of the option can be used to call a dense function (TH/THC) and a sparse function (THS/THCS).

Right now `sparse=True` is only used for functions called on dense tensors that have sparse tensor arguments.  `sparse=True` makes the code generation go through a path that checks if `aten_dense_sparse` is a part of the option.
body_html:
For a given option, aten_sparse says that the cname of the option can be used to call a dense function (TH/THC) and a sparse function (THS/THCS).

Right now sparse=True is only used for functions called on dense tensors that have sparse tensor arguments. sparse=True makes the code generation go through a path that checks if aten_dense_sparse is a part of the option.
body_text:
For a given option, aten_sparse says that the cname of the option can be used to call a dense function (TH/THC) and a sparse function (THS/THCS).
Right now sparse=True is only used for functions called on dense tensors that have sparse tensor arguments.  sparse=True makes the code generation go through a path that checks if aten_dense_sparse is a part of the option.
